definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: chief, overseer (Targum id. (=BH [[שׁׂטֵר]]); etym. dub.; prob. with Bev:Dn Dr:Dn Andr:M 75*, loan-word fr. Pers. sār (and * sarak ?), head, chief);—pl. abs. [[סָֽרְכִין]] Da 6:3, emph. [[סָֽרְכַיׇּא]] v:Da 6:4, v:Da 6:5, v:Da 6:7, cstr. [[סָֽרְבֵי]] v:Da 6:8.
